name: Castello Vicchiomaggio

reviews.text: We drove up to the impressive estate only to find I had mixed up the dates and didnt have a roomavailable, they were very nice and found me another place to stay then booked us for the following nights at the same rate. We stayed on the second floor in the Rococco room. 2 massive rooms with huge stone fireplaces and tall wondows overlooking the fantastic vineyard and gardens below. The kitchen was well equipped and the bed was fluffly. If you want to feel like a princess in a fairy tale stay here it was a great experience and gorgeuos. The location is also very convenient to town. We booked ourselves for the wine tour and dinner and the food was good and a good value, although the wines were better! While in the area eat @ the Villa Bordoni and The Cantina just off the main square in Greve

Under The Tuscan Sun -- Visiting Castello Vicchiomaggio
reviews.text: There were no washing facilities - only a dry cleaning service in Greve.

My husband, myself, and my 2 daughters had a great 3 nights here in August. Sandra at the front desk, once we found her, was very courteous and helpful (also very prompt to reply to e-mails). We were given the grand tour once we checked in and all the rules were explained. A fresh basket of fruit and a bottle of vin santo were waiting in our Leonardo suite. Plenty of supplies for breakfast, with eggs/jam/cookies being replenished daily. We loved coming back to "our" castle after spending the morning exploring. The views are incredible, rooms are spacious, the pool was wonderful. This castle was the highlight of our 3 week trip.

reviews.text: We stayed at Castello Vicchiomaggio for 4 nights. It was an awesome experience. The views are breath taking and the castle itself is tremendous. We were a group of 5, 2 of which were teenagers. They absolutely loved it as we did. The problem we had was that the restaurant was not open so we had to go into Greve for dinner. Also as per the other reviews the reception desk is not clearly marked so you will have to look around for it, leave your luggage in the car until you find it. It is located in a building in the gardens of the Castle.

aka: Castello Vicchiomaggio Hotel Greve In Chianti
description: Castello Vicchiomaggio (Vicchiomaggio Castle), one of the most beautiful and well-preserved castles in Tuscany, immersed in a park of more than 130 hectares, is an elegant holiday farm, a perfect location for wedding receptions, meetings and events organisation, as well as a renowned wine estate.Located in the heart of Chianti, it is a jewel nestled among hills, and a shrine of hospitality to celebrate the most important day of your life, as well as a holiday resort offering the utmost relax, or to enjoy tasting of various wines and typical products and to organise your meeting or gala evening.
